article_title: Draft of Climate-Change Accord Shows Major Policy Disputes Remain
article_text:
PARIS—Ministers from around the world arrived this weekend at a climate-change summit here with a heavy negotiating burden, after a week of lower-level talks resolved none of the main disputes standing in the way of a deal among nearly 200 nations to limit global warming.

Negotiators released a draft of an agreement on Saturday showing they have been unable to resolve major policy disputes, mainly between developing and developed...
